description.$t:
** COURTESY POSTING **

PLEASE CONTACT JOY at 310-205-0152 IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN ADOPTING

Super playful and outgoing 3-month-old neutered male who was rescued from a high-kill shelter with his two brothers and sister.  He has a special place in his heart for his sister, Jasmine.  They have all been bottle fed and hand raised and love to follow their rescuer's dogs around the house.  Adopt one, two, or all three - they'd be a great addition to any family!

** COURTESY POSTING **

PLEASE CONTACT JOY at 310-205-0152 IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN ADOPTING

Super playful and outgoing 3-month-old spayed female who was rescued from a high-kill shelter with her three brothers.  She is her brother Marcus' favorite sibling. They have all been bottle fed and hand raised and love to follow her rescuer's dogs around the house.  Adopt one, two, or all three - they'd be a great addition to any family!

** COURTESY POSTING **

PLEASE CONTACT JOY at 310-205-0152 IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN ADOPTING

Super playful and outgoing 3-month-old neutered male who was rescued from a high-kill shelter with his two brothers and sister.  They have all been bottle fed and hand raised and love to follow their rescuer's dogs around the house.  Adopt one, two, or all three - they'd be a great addition to any family!

** COURTESY POSTING **

PLEASE CONTACT JOY at 310-205-0152 IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN ADOPTING

Super playful and outgoing 3-month-old neutered male who was rescued from a high-kill shelter with his two brothers and sister.  They have all been bottle fed and hand raised and love to follow their rescuer's dogs around the house.  Adopt one, two, or all three - they'd be a great addition to any family!

Gertrude was found on the street in pretty bad shape. She was emaciated, had mange and a badly infected eye. For awhile, we did not think she would survive. However, this sweet kitty is strong and resilient and is doing much better.

Due to a medical condition, Gertrude is incontinent and will need a home that can accommodate her special needs. 

She is a gentle soul and will make a great cat for anyone looking for an affectionate companion. We think Gerty is about 10 years old but has shown us she clearly has 9 lives left!

Gertrude can be seen by appointment. She does not attend our adoption events. 


INTERESTED IN ADOPTING?Check our website at www.billfoundation.org for an adoption event schedule, and for information on how to adopt. For adoption process click, "How to  Adopt," then click, "Adopting from TBF". To find the cat application click, "How to Adopt," then click, "Forms & Applications," then click, "Cats".Complete the application online and submit. Our adoption committee will review your  application, and someone will contact you. If you are unable to attend our bi-monthly adoption events, we are able to show dogs/cats by private appointment when an application is submitted that seems to be a  particularly good match for one of our rescues!

APPLICANT MUST COMPLETE AN ONLINE ADOPTION APPLICATION
APPLICANT MUST BE AT LEAST 21 YEARS OLD
APPLICANT SHOULD LIVE IN THE LOS ANGELES AREA

My name is Mildred.  I am a young beautiful girl with thick, lush sable fur.  I came to the Amanda Foundation with Edith when our human dad went to heaven.  We are both sweet, gentle girls who are just a little scared and wonder why we are here.  We love being in a home and cuddling.  Won't you give us a call.?  Please?   Love Mildred

Sally is a breath-taking Siamese/Snowshoe mix that is about three years old. She is incredibly affectionate, loving and gets along well with other cats. Looking for a blue-eyed beauty to add to your family? Call 310-278-2935!

breed.$t: Domestic Short Hair - orange and white

description.$t:
Meet sweet and happy Summer.  She is a beautiful peach
and white 6 year old lady. Loves to be pet and sit on you lap. Summer
is the whole package and loves her friend Noah.

Introducing the stunning Star!  Star is a young 2 year old Siamese mix.  This gorgeous girl will flirt with you with her beautiful blue eyes.  She loves to play and be the center of attention. If you are looking for for a beauty with a personality, Star is your girl.

breed.$t: Domestic Medium Hair - gray and white

description.$t: This pretty green eyed girl is between 9 -10 years old.  Perfect as your only kitty and lap warmer Give Lacy a second chance and welcome this special girl into your home.

This is sexy, sassy, Sally, one of our favorites.  Look into her eyes and let her cast her spell. Sweet Sally is a Snowshoe, Siamese mix.  She will sleep on your lap and be your forever girl.  She would be great as an only kitty, or with another mellow kitty. To meet her is to love her.
Bradbury  is a very happy 8 year old boy, and would love to be in a kind and forever home. As soon as you meet Bradbury, you will fall in love with his sweet personality.

All vaccines are current, she is microchipped, and is positive for FCV, which is a respiratory virus, so she would need to be an only cat. Elaine shows no signs of the virus presently, but it can resurface. She is looking for a second chance in a quiet home as the only kitty. Please consider this lovely 2 year old beauty.
Coco is a handsome chocolate Havanese mix.  This young cat is sweet and gentle, loves people and other cats.

Kalinda is a beautiful 6 year old long haired Calico princess, who wants to be treated that way.  She is affectionate, tolerates other cats, but definitely will be the alpha. She has a colorful personality that will warm your heart and keep you guessing.

Little Frida is a year old beautiful Tortie.  She loves rubs and pets and lots of attention.
She is playful, cute and talkative.  A perfect purr baby that will touch your heart.

breed.$t: Domestic Short Hair - gray and white

description.$t: This green eyed girl will win you over with her playful personality.  She is a young 2-3 year old who would love to be in a forever home. Lots of love to share with her new family.
Honeydew is an elegant and beautiful young kitten who is eagerly awaiting a loving forever home. She is friendly, playful, and loves to cuddle. Come meet Honeydew and fall deeply in love!

Cookie is a real stunner; just look at that gorgeous tuxedo! Luckily for her (and you!), she's got a personality to match. Come meet Cookie, because she is very excited to meet you and move in to her forever home.
Gunther is a very spirited young kitten. He definitely has an adventurer's spirit, and loves to play and explore, so if you're looking for a playful and vivacious little buddy, Gunther is your man!

Meet Heidi (brown striped Tabby), and Helen (grey tabby), two young females with a lot of love to give. Just stare into Helen's hypnotic blue eyes, and you'll fall deeply and helplessly in love with her or her sister. Come meet one (or both!) of them today!

Holly & Hannah are two beautiful sisters, who (along with sisters Heidi & Helen) came into this world full of personality and love. Come meet these two and let either of them absolutely melt your heart.

breed.$t: Domestic Medium Hair - gray and white

description.$t: Deter & David are two very playful brothers, whose desire to goof around is only outdone by their desire to cuddle up with you. Come meet these beautiful and friendly boys!

breed.$t: Domestic Medium Hair - gray and white

description.$t: Damien & Demetrius are brothers from the same litter as David & Deter, and are just as loving and playful as their brothers. With amazing personalities and hypnotizing-eyes, just a few minutes with either of these two and you'll be helplessly in love. Come meet them today!
Andy & Alex are two peas in a pod, both of them playful and cuddly cuties. All they need now is a loving forever home, and they'd surely be the happiest cats in town!
